thumb.title: The Last Song / 初音ミク
thumb.description: The Last Songアスファルトを染める茜色ビルの隙間に消える太陽子供たちの声が遠ざかる変わらない街並み過ぎ去った日々を重ねて明日へ向かう世紀末の夕焼け空希望と不安が入り混じる未来への扉を次の世界を信じてみたいThe crimson color of the asphalt, the sun disappearing between the buildings, the voices of children fading away, the streets are unchanged, but I feel something is different, stacking up the days gone by, I dream of tomorrow, the evening sky at the end of the century, hope and anxiety mixed together, but I still want to believe, so let's open the door to the futureMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : Sonata
